Moving can be a very stressful experience but with friendly customer service, attention to efficiency, and our many years of expertise, we will make your moving day as light as possible. Highlights  Complete packing and un-packing services if you need. * Trucks with lots of moving pads and equipment * Courteous and friendly staff * On time pickup, loading and unloading * Simple disassembly and reassembly of your furniture if you need * Transportation to and from your residence * Furniture/ electronics rearrangement * Very competitive and reasonable prices * Door to door pick up and delivery * Use of wardrobe boxes to hang your clothing ((((((free)))))) * Time starts at moving stuff and ends upon completion of your move * Free sofa and mattress covers----------blanket and shrink wramp * Free blanket wrap * Free dolly and hand truck and tools * professional movers ,fast ,honest Pricing Local Moves Hourly Rates * Two men crew: $65.00/hr (Minimum 2 hour) * Three men crew: $85.00/hr (Minimum 2 hour) * Additional man: + $35.00/hr (Minimum 2 hour) Contact Feel free to contact us with any questions or to schedule a free estimate.
